title: INFUSE PEACE - GLASS TEA INFUSER BOTTLE - Eco-Friendly Double-Layer Tea Infuser Bottle for Loose Leaf TEA HERBAL FRUIT - LEAKPROOF Water Infuser Mug - Insulated Tumbler (Beige)
features: ★ SMART GLASS TEA INFUSER BOTTLE – Our 14oz tea infuser is the perfect way for you to enjoy your favorite hot teas and beverages in a unique and exciting way. You can make herbal or fruit teas, use tea bags, or experiment to create delicious new beverages.

★ PREMIUM-QUALITY MATERIALS – Our glass tea tumbler infuser is made using high-quality and durable materials such as heat resistant (between -20 to 150 degrees C.) double-layered borosilicate glass, food grade silicone, and a 304 stainless-steel filter.

★ SAFE & ECO-FRIENDLY – With our travel tea infuser tumbler being made from borosilicate glass, and stainless-steel for the filter, it’s entirely BPA-free and toxin-free. Plus, these materials are 100% recyclable and biodegradable, making them eco-friendly.

★ LEAKPROOF DESIGN – Thanks to our fruit infusers double airtight seal on both ends of the lid, we have been able to make this glass tea tumbler infuser entirely leakproof. Ensuring that when you make your tea or other favorite beverage, no water drips or leaks out.

★ EASY TO USE – To use our glass water bottle with tea infuser, first place your tea/fruit/herbs into the small pot and then seal it with the lid. Pour hot water into the 14oz glass tea bottle and attach the lid. Then turn it upside down and watch as the water fuses with the tea/fruit.
description: Infuse Peace Glass Tea Infuser Bottle – A New Way to Enjoy Your Favorite Teas

If you enjoy making tea with fresh loose leaf tea, or fresh fruit then you’ll absolutely love our tea infuser water bottle. Our travel tea infuser bottles are made using premium-quality and eco-friendly materials that are entirely BPA-free. The main 14oz tea bottle has been crafted using double-layered, heat resistant, high-boron silicone glass which is incredibly durable insulated. For the double insulated glass tea bottle, it’s made with high borosilicate glass. Finally, our filter is made from 304 food-grade stainless-steel and has been designed to ensure little to no herbal matter transfers into the bottle when infusing. With its gravity infusion design, this glass infuser provides you a new exciting and efficient way to enjoy your favorite infused beverages in just seconds.
Our tea infuser glass tumbler is quick and simple to use:
1. Put your herbal tea or fruit into the infusion tea pot.
2. Screw the lid onto the tea pot.
3. Pour Hot water into the glass tea bottle and seal it with the other side of the lid.
4. Once properly sealed, slowly turn the tea bottle upside down and watch as the water becomes infused.
5. Turn the tea bottle upright, unscrew the lid, and enjoy your freshly infused tea.

You also won’t have to worry about any leaks thanks to its leakproof lid. If leaks occur reset plastic ring. We’ve fashioned our lid with a food grade silicone ring to securely hold the stainless-steel filter in place and to ensure no tea water escapes while infusing. The lid also has a lift strap attached to it so that you can easily carry your glass infuser with you anywhere you go.
button to start enjoying your favorite teas the quick, easy, and eco-friendly way with our Travel Tea Infuser Bottle, today!
